config package¶

Submodules¶

config.ctrl_vector_im_2kW module¶

This script configures sensorless vector control for a 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

class config.ctrl_vector_im_2kW.BaseValues(w: float = 314.1592653589793, i: float = 7.0710678118654755, u: float = 326.5986323710904, p: int = 2, psi: float = 1.0395957349782348, P: float = 3464.1016151377544, Z: float = 46.18802153517006, L: float = 0.14702103877914455, tau: float = 22.05315581687168)¶

Bases: object

This data class contains the base values computed from the rated values. These are used for plotting the results.

config.ctrl_vector_im_45kW module¶

This script configures sensorless vector control for an induction motor. The default values correspond to a 45-kW induction motor.

config.ctrl_vhz_im_2kW module¶

This script configures V/Hz control for an induction motor. The default values correspond to a 2.2-kW induction motor.

config.mdl_im_2kW module¶

This file contains the configuration data for the 2.2-kW induction motor drive.

This file contains the configuration data for the 45-kW induction motor drive.
